text: Andrés Fernández de Córdova Nieto (28 May 1892 - 3 October 1983) was President of Ecuador from December 1939 to August 1940. He later ran as a presidential candidate in 1968. ==References== *Ben Cahoon. Ecuador WorldStatesman.org *Rulers.org Category:1892 births Category:1983 deaths Category:Presidents of Ecuador Category:Politicians from Quito
title: Andrés Córdova
